name: Tech Venture Advisors
overview:
Tech Venture Advisors provides M&A and capital-raising services to tech-centered companies.

  1. Sale mandates — Sweet spot: $25- $250 million expected valuation; sale of company or corporate divestiture — Deliver full process or manage targeted M&A negotiations

  2. Buy-side M&A advisory — Sweet spot: $10 - $100 million acquisitions for public companies — Areas of focus: acquisition strategy, target identification and approaches, negotiations

  3. Capital-raising — Sweet spot: $10+ million raises, “B” or later rounds — Institutional and corporate sources of capital
